name: Petoneer
0:
”Alexa, ask petoneer turn on the fountain”
”Alexa, ask petoneer what is the TDS value of the fountain”
”Alexa, ask petoneer feed two portions on feeder”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: petoneer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Smart fountain operation example:
If you want to control the fountain, you can say "Alexa, ask petoneer turn on fountain." you can see the device name in the Petoneer app;
If you want to turn off the smart fountain's light, you can say "Alexa, ask petoneer turn off the light of the fountain.";
If you want to know the water level, you can say "Alexa, ask petoneer what is the level of the fountain?",
To know TDS value, you can say "Alexa, ask petoneer what is the TDS value of fountain?"

Feeder operation example:
To feed your pets, you can say "Alexa, ask petoneer feed three portions on feeder".
